battleTraits.name: Timberrrrr!
battleTraits.effect: Each time a friendly **MEGA-GARGANT** or **GARGANT** model is slain, before removing it from play, the players must roll off. The winner picks a point on the battlefield within 3" of that model. Inflict D3 mortal damage on each unit (friendly and enemy) within 3" of that point that has a lower Health characteristic than that model.

battleTraits.name: Gargant Charge
battleTraits.declare: Pick a friendly **MEGA-GARGANT** or **GARGANT** unit that charged this turn and has not used a **RAMPAGE** ability this turn to use this ability, then pick a visible enemy unit within 1" of it to be the target.
battleTraits.effect: Roll a D3. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.

battleTraits.name: Earthshaking Roar

header.text: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase

battleTraits.declare: Pick a friendly **MEGA-GARGANT** or **GARGANT** unit that has not used a **RAMPAGE** ability this turn to use this ability, then pick an enemy unit in combat with it to be the target.
battleTraits.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, the target cannot use commands for the rest of the turn.

battleTraits.name: Colossal Slam

header.text: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase

battleTraits.declare: Pick a friendly **MEGA-GARGANT** that has not used a **RAMPAGE** ability this turn to use this ability, then pick an enemy **MONSTER** or **WAR MACHINE** within 1" of it to be the target.
battleTraits.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, remove the target from the battlefield and set it up again within 1" of the unit using this ability. Then, inflict D3 mortal damage on the target.

battleTraits.name: Jump up and Down

header.text: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase

battleTraits.declare: Pick a friendly **MEGA-GARGANT** or **GARGANT** unit that has not used a **RAMPAGE** ability this turn to use this ability, then pick an enemy **INFANTRY** unit in combat with it to be the target.
battleTraits.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, roll a dice for each model in the target unit. If the unit using this ability is a **GARGANT**, inflict 1 mortal damage on the target for each 6. If it is a **MEGA-GARGANT**, inflict 1 mortal damage on the target for each 5+.

abilities.name: More Stuff for me Collection
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly non-**UNIQUE SONS OF BEHEMAT HERO** that does not have an artefact of power.
abilities.effect: Give that **HERO** 1 artefact of power from 'Titanic Trophies'.

artefacts.name: Amberstone Totem

header.text: Once Per Battle, Your Charge Phase

artefacts.effect: For the rest of the turn, this unit can use **CHARGE** abilities even if it used a **RUN** ability in the same turn.

artefacts.name: Glowy Lantern
artefacts.effect: Pick 1 manifestation lore available to your faction. This unit can use **SUMMON** abilities from that manifestation lore as if it had **WIZARD (1)**.

artefacts.name: Mantle of Tusk and Horns

header.text: Once Per Battle, Your Combat Phase

artefacts.effect: For the rest of the turn, add 1 to hit rolls for combat attacks made by friendly **SONS OF BEHEMAT** units while they are wholly within 12" of this unit.

artefacts.name: Extra-Calloused Feet
artefacts.effect: Add 1 to the Attacks characteristics, Rend characteristics and Damage characteristics of this unit's **Almighty Stomp** or **Almightier Stopmp**

artefacts.name: Glowy Shield of Protectiness
artefacts.effect: Each time you make an unmodified save roll of 6 for a combat attack that targets this unit, inflict 1 mortal damage on the attacking unit after the **FIGHT** ability has been resolved.

artefacts.name: Kingslaughter Cowl
artefacts.effect: Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of this unit's melee weapons while this unit is in combat with an enemy HERO.

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 15 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of its **Fortcrusha Flail** is 4 and this unit has a Control characteristic of 10.

abilities.name: Son of Behemat
abilities.effect: If this unit would be automatically destroyed, it is not automatically destroyed. Instead, allocate 6 damage points to it (ward rolls cannot be made for those damage points).

abilities.name: Longshanks
abilities.effect: This unit can pass through models in non-**MONSTER** units and parts of terrain features that are less than 4" tall.

abilities.name: Pulverising Strike
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: This unit can make a pile-in move.  Then, roll a dice. On a 4+, inflict 4D6 mortal damage on the target.

abilities.name: Smash Down

header.text: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase

abilities.declare: Pick a terrain feature within 3" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: If the target is **FACTION TERRAIN**, inflict D3+3 mortal damage on it. Then, roll a D3 for each non-**MONSTER** unit (friendly and enemy) within 3" of the target. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on that unit equal to the roll.

abilities.effect: While this unit has 15 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of its **Obelisk of Tor Crania** is 4 and this unit has a Control characteristic of 10.

abilities.name: Power of Behemat
abilities.declare: Make a chanting roll of D6.
abilities.effect:
Pick 1 of the following effects. If the chanting roll was 10+, pick 2 instead:

 _**Shatter the Mountains:**_ Add 2" to the Move characteristic of friendly SONS OF BEHEMAT units for the rest of the turn.

 _**Might of the Earth:**_ **Heal (D3)** each friendly **SONS OF BEHEMAT** unit.

 _**Pummel All to Dust:**_ For the rest of the turn, add 1 to the Rend characteristic of the **Obelisk of Tor Crania**, **Menhir Club**, **Fortcrusha Flail**, **Shipwrecka Warclub**, **Titanic Boulderclub** and **Massive Club** used by friendly **SONS OF BEHEMAT** units.

abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. If the roll is at least double the target's Health characteristic, 1 model in the target unit is slain.

abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. If the roll is at least double the target's Health characteristic, 1 model in that unit is slain and you can pick a visible enemy unit within 12" of this unit. Inflict an amount of mortal damage on that unit equal to the target's Health characteristic.
